thread.title: Coffee, croissants and canines at NYC dog friendly cafe

title: Coffee, croissants and canines at NYC dog friendly cafe
text:
Coffee, croissants and canines at NYC dog friendly cafe 6:28pm GMT - 02:00 
Boris & Horton is New York's first ever dog friendly cafe where dog owners can fetch treats for themselves, their pets and hang out. Rough Cut (no reporter narration). ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
Boris & Horton is New York's first ever dog friendly cafe where dog owners can fetch treats for themselves, their pets and hang out. Rough Cut (no reporter narration). Press CTRL+C (Windows), CMD+C (Mac), or long-press the URL below on your mobile device to copy the code https://reut.rs/2nbkx6w
